articles.title: EUV Chipmaking: How US Lost Control of Cutting Edge Semiconductor Tech - Bloomberg
articles.description: It was a strategic misstep of epic proportions. The US took a crucial early role in developing the semiconductor technology that underpins today’s revolution in artificial intelligence. Yet it’s a Dutch firm that now holds a monopoly on the process, and Asian…
